procedure.title: Installing the &abbrev; server on Linux
procedure.para: To install &product; in server mode, complete the following steps:
Running &product; in server mode requires a license file. The license determines how many individual hosts can connect to the server. You can obtain the license from your sales representative.

step.para: Copy the installer and license.txt file to the server.
Execute the following command as root:
Select Continue on the Welcome screen, and accept the EULA.
Verify that the system summary is correct.
If false information is displayed, your platform might not be supported. Abort installation, and if necessary, contact &vendor; for support.
Keep the default installation path and register your installation. Existing syslog implementations on the system are replaced.
Provide the full path to the license file (license.txt).
The installer generates a very basic configuration file during the installation process. Provide the following answers for the following questions:

row.entry: Remote source: Do you want to receive log messages from the network?
Remote destination: To forward your log messages to a remote server, enter the address of the server and select OK. Otherwise, select Skip.

step.para: The installer stops the previously installed syslog implementation, and starts the &abbrev; server.
